001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.space;
002
003import org.springframework.lang.NonNull;
004import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
005
006/**
007 * For all intends and purposes this is a singleton. However, managed by Spring.
008 *
009 * @author GustavBW
010 * @version $Id: $Id
011 */
012public interface ISpaceProvider<T extends ISpace> {
013    /**
014     * Provides a new managed, IScreenSpace instance.
015     *
016     * @param forWhom NOT NULL. A ISpace instance can only be managed, if properties of the class that retrieves the instance can be read.
017     * @return a T object
018     */
019    T getScreenSpace(Object forWhom);
020}
